Package com.github.jnstockley

Class Helper

java.lang.Object
com.github.jnstockley.Helper
public class Helper
extends java.lang.Object
Helper class, which focuses on retrieving data required throughout the program
Version:
1.0
Author:
Jack Stockley

  • Method Details

    • getOldStatus

      protected static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Boolean> getOldStatus​(java.lang.String filepath)
      Reads the JSON config file and returns the old live status for each channel
      Parameters:
      filepath - Location of JSON config file
      Returns:
      HashMap with a channel and a boolean representing live state

    • getAuth

      protected static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> getAuth​(java.lang.String filepath)
      Reads the JSON config file and gets the API Keys required for the program to run and returns them
      Parameters:
      filepath - Location of JSON config file
      Returns:
      HashMap with all the API keys used in the program

    • getStatus

      protected static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String>> getStatus​(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> channels, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> auth)
      Uses the Twitch API to get the current live status, and game channel is streaming of the channels in the JSON config file
      Parameters:
      channels - Set of all the channels to check
      auth - HashMap with the API Keys
      Returns:
      HashMap with the channel and another HashMap with String representation of live status and game streaming

    • updateStatusFile

      protected static void updateStatusFile​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String>> currStatus, java.lang.String filepath)
      Writes live status changes for the channels to the JSON config file
      Parameters:
      currStatus - HashMap with update live status for channels
      filepath - Location of JSON config file

    • getDelay

      protected static int getDelay​(java.lang.String filepath)
      Reads the JSON config file and get update notification delay
      Parameters:
      filepath - Location of JSON config file
      Returns:
      An integer representing number of minutes between update notification being sent

    • getSection

      private static org.json.simple.JSONObject getSection​(java.lang.String filepath, java.lang.String section)
      Reads the JSON config file and returns a specified JSON key 'section'
      Parameters:
      filepath - Location of JSON config file
      section - String representing the JSON key to be returned
      Returns:
      JSON Object containing the value from the specified key

    • configUpToDate

      protected static boolean configUpToDate​(java.lang.String filepath)
      Helper function witch runs at the start of the main program to make sure the version number of the JSON config file is up to date
      Parameters:
      filepath - Location of JSON config file
      Returns:
      True if the config file is up to date, otherwise false

    • configUpgrade

      protected static void configUpgrade​(java.lang.String filepath)
      Performs upgrade to JSON config file to add new features and fix bugs
      Parameters:
      filepath - Location of the JSON config file

    • addMisc

      protected static void addMisc​(java.lang.String filepath)
      Helper function which makes sure the miscellaneous JSON keys are in the JSON config file and if not adds them to the file

      filepath - Location of the JSON config file
